titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 840 entitled "For the relief of the estate of Dr. Beatrice Braude" to the Chief Judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 205.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Refers S. 840 (for the relief of the estate of a named individual) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims.
